name: Intergalactic Defense
description:
Hiya folks!

use your mouse to aim and shoot the new Intergalactic Defense system to defend your home planet before its too late!

this is a game made in one day by me as an attempt at a mobile game, after realizing that its too hard, I decided to patch it into a half decent PC game, keep in mind, this was made in ONE DAY so it is very scuffed, but I still decided to post it here just for fun.

please report any bugs or send some feedback in the comments or on my discord server.

JOIN US ON DISCORD ----------> https://discord.gg/TkDvsM34Xa

-NOTE-

This was a mobile game, but the .apk and all that glitched like hell, if you want to try it, by all means, go ahead, but its recommend to play on PC. If you would like to attempt to see if the .apk file works,  join my discord server, its posted in there.

-Credits-

all credit goes to the Press Delete team, I am the only member of that team right now, so all credit goes to me! 

Programming : Quaffy 

Art : Quaffy

Everything : Quaffy

Special thanks to YOU for looking at this page and considering to play this game.
